node1.name: Water Filtration
node1.description: Filter water to meet WHO standards using ceramic filters with validated filtration efficiency.

embodiment.description: Ceramic filters with pore size optimized for contaminant removal, tested to meet WHO standards.

physics_models.name: Filtration Model
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_flow_rate(pressure_diff, viscosity=1.0, resistance=1.0):
    return pressure_diff / (viscosity * resistance)

physics_models.name: Contaminant Removal Model
physics_models.equations: Removal Efficiency (%) = (Initial Contaminant Concentration - Final Contaminant Concentration) / Initial Contaminant Concentration * 100
assumptions: Contaminant concentration measured before and after filtration

node1.verification_plan: Testing under controlled conditions to measure water production rate and water quality.
